ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] JM Capozi
ygData.msgSnippet: At around that level I paired up with, at different times, a druid, a rogue, and a wizard and did the gorge by EK.  Very nice!  It was just slightly more than
ygData.messageBody:
At around that level I paired up with, at different times, a druid, a
rogue, and a wizard and did the gorge by EK. Very nice! It was just
slightly more than I'd want to do solo, but perfect for a duo. I mostly
tanked using a mandolin & CoD/Hymn/Bellow combo. Rarely *had* to flee, but
it's tough to get a pickup partner to understand how you can "do that math"
with multiple mobs and know you're going to survive despite being down to
two bubbles with three baddies pounding you. :-)

But I should hush up already. Been far to chatty today.

Evulia, "I'm like Madonna, I don't need a surname", Tunare




"Cranfill, Wendy"
<Wendy_Cranfill@m To: "'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'" <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
axtor.com> cc:
Subject: RE: [eqbards] JM Capozi
11/06/2001 02:32
PM
Please respond to
eqbards






Four words: Lake of Ill Omen!

Or is it too crowded? I had great luck there, lots of different conning
mobs, outdoor zone, easy to get a group if you wanted but easy to solo as
well.

EK is good I think at the Canyon zone at that level, the gorge hounds are
good exp. But I think you can survive solo there, just dont know about
making exp :P

Halana/Tani
Solusek Ro
